hero.title: Local IT Support For Allgäu Businesses
hero.subtitle: Reliable, straightforward tech solutions that just work, from a local IT expert who understands your business needs.

services.title: How I Can Help Your Business
services.subtitle: Practical tech solutions that save you time, reduce headaches, and keep your business running smoothly.

indexPage.title: Services & Solutions
indexPage.description: Explore my range of IT services designed to help Allgäu businesses work more efficiently and securely.

it.title: Worry-Free IT Support
it.description: Keep your business running without technology getting in the way.

features.one: Fast, responsive help when something breaks
features.three: Straightforward security that protects your business

details.intro: Technology should help your business, not create more work. I provide practical IT support that keeps things simple and reliable.
details.para1: Whether you need help with day-to-day issues, setting up secure systems, or making sure your data is protected and backed up, I handle the technical details so you can focus on running your business.
details.para2: My approach emphasizes reliability and prevention – identifying and fixing potential problems before they impact your business operations.
details.conclusion: Think of me as your personal IT department, just without the overhead costs.

digital.title: Simplified Digital Tools
digital.description: Streamline your operations with practical digital solutions.

features.one: Straightforward cloud migration that makes sense for you
features.two: Business tools that save time and reduce paperwork
features.three: Remote work solutions that keep your team connected

details.intro: Digital transformation doesn't have to be complicated. I help small businesses in the Allgäu region adopt practical digital tools that make day-to-day work easier.
details.listIntro: My focus is on solutions that deliver real benefits:
listItems: Moving to simple cloud systems that reduce IT headaches
Setting up digital tools that eliminate paperwork and manual processes
Creating secure ways for your team to work from anywhere
details.para1: I start by understanding how your business works, then recommend only the tools that will genuinely improve your operations.
details.para2: No unnecessary complexity and no pushing technology you don't need – just practical solutions that make your business more efficient.
details.conclusion: The right digital tools should simplify your work, not complicate it.

ai.title: Practical AI Integration
ai.description: Save time with AI tools that handle routine tasks for you.

features.one: Simple ways to automate repetitive work
features.two: AI tools that help your team be more productive
features.three: Practical applications without the technical complexity

details.intro: AI doesn't have to be complicated or expensive. I help small businesses in Allgäu use practical AI tools to save time and work more efficiently.
details.para1: My approach focuses on simple, affordable ways to use AI in your day-to-day business:
listItems: Setting up AI assistants to handle routine customer questions
Implementing tools that automatically process documents and data
Training your team to use AI effectively for common tasks
details.para2: I won't overwhelm you with technical jargon or suggest complex systems. Instead, I focus on straightforward AI solutions that deliver immediate benefits to your business.
details.conclusion: Let's put AI to work on the routine tasks so you can focus on what really matters.

consultation.title: Get a Free IT Consultation
consultation.subtitle: Let's talk about your technology needs over coffee – no technical jargon, no sales pressure.
consultation.description: Not sure where to start? I offer a free 30-minute consultation to understand your business needs and suggest practical next steps that make sense for your budget and goals.

items.one: A straightforward assessment of your current IT setup
items.two: Practical recommendations that fit your budget
items.four: Honest advice on what you actually need (and don't need)

form.name: Your Name
form.message: Tell me briefly about your business and what you need help with
form.privacy: I respect your privacy and will never share your information with third parties.

consultation.success: Thanks for reaching out! I'll contact you personally within 24 hours to schedule your free consultation.

footer.description: Local IT support and straightforward technology solutions for small businesses throughout the Allgäu region. Based in Bavaria, serving local clients with personal attention and practical expertise.
footer.service_area: Serving businesses throughout the Allgäu region

Services.title: Our Services
Services.digitalDesc: Modernizing your business for the digital age
Services.aiDesc: Implementing AI solutions to optimize workflows

Footer.copyright: © 2024 Ingio IT Services. All rights reserved.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our company, mission, and the team behind Ingio IT Services

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: At Ingio IT Services, our mission is to empower small businesses with enterprise-grade technology solutions that are accessible, efficient, and future-proof. We believe that every business deserves the power of modern technology, regardless of size.

client.title: Client-Centered Focus
client.description: We put your business goals at the center of every solution we design.

tailored.title: Tailored Solutions
tailored.description: We create custom strategies that fit your specific business needs and budget.

futureproof.title: Future-Proof Technology
futureproof.description: We implement scalable solutions that grow with your business.

story.title: Our Story
story.part1: Ingio IT Services was founded in 2018 by technology enthusiasts who saw a gap in the market: small businesses in Bavaria were not receiving the level of IT support they needed to truly thrive in the digital age.
story.part2: What started as a small consulting practice has grown into a comprehensive IT service provider, helping dozens of local businesses modernize their operations, secure their data, and leverage new technologies.
story.part3: Today, we specialize in bridging the gap between traditional business operations and cutting-edge technology, with a particular focus on AI integration and digital transformation.

founder.name: Ingi Gauti
founder.bio: With over 15 years in IT consulting and software development, Ingi brings vision and leadership to every project.

tech.name: Maria Schmidt
tech.bio: Maria's expertise in network architecture and cloud solutions ensures our technical implementations are robust and scalable.

solutions.name: Thomas Weber
solutions.bio: Thomas specializes in translating business needs into practical technology solutions with a focus on AI and automation.

overview.title: Modern IT Infrastructure Solutions
overview.description: A robust IT infrastructure is the backbone of any successful business today. At Ingio IT Services, we design, implement, and maintain secure, reliable, and scalable IT systems that support your business operations and growth objectives.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Protect your business data and operations with enterprise-grade security solutions tailored to your specific needs.

reliability.title: Increased Reliability
reliability.description: Minimize downtime and disruptions with redundant systems and proactive monitoring and maintenance.

scalability.title: Future-Ready Scalability
scalability.description: Build systems that grow with your business, avoiding costly overhauls as your needs evolve.

networkSecurity.title: Network Security & Management
networkSecurity.description: We design, implement, and maintain secure and efficient networks that form the foundation of your IT infrastructure.

features.2: Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) for secure remote access

hardware.title: Hardware & Software Integration
hardware.description: We source, set up, and integrate the right hardware and software solutions to meet your business requirements.

maintenance.title: Proactive Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: We ensure your IT systems run smoothly with regular maintenance and responsive support.

features.3: Help desk support for your team

cta.title: Ready to Strengthen Your IT Infrastructure?
cta.description: Let us help you build a robust, secure, and scalable IT infrastructure that supports your business goals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Ingio IT Services, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website or services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We may collect various types of information, including:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details you provide when you contact us or use our services.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: Information about how you use our website, including IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our site.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use your information for various purposes, including:

items.provide: To provide and maintain our services
items.improve: To improve and personalize your experience with our website and services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about our services, promotions, and updates
items.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:

items.providers: Service providers who help us deliver our services
items.legal: Law enforcement agencies when required by law

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can request access to your personal data we hold

correction.title: Right to Correction
correction.description: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.description: You can request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to our processing of your personal data

withdrawal.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdrawal.description: You can withdraw your consent at any time where we relied on your consent to process your personal data

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Ingio IT Services. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our website or services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our services.

services.title: Services Description
services.description: Ingio IT Services provides IT infrastructure, digitalization, and AI integration services for businesses, as described on our website and in our service agreements.
services.modification: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time without prior notice.

user.title: User Responsibilities
user.description: As a user of our services, you are responsible for:

responsibilities.accurate: Providing accurate and complete information when communicating with us
responsibilities.security: Maintaining the security of any credentials or access provided to you
responsibilities.laws: Complying with all applicable laws and regulations
responsibilities.conduct: Ensuring that your use of our services does not infringe upon the rights of others

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.description: The content, features, and functionality of our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by Ingio IT Services and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
ip.ownership: Client-specific work and deliverables are governed by the terms specified in individual service agreements.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: In no event shall Ingio IT Services, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services.
liability.limitation: Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law and shall not exceed the amount paid by you, if any, for using our services.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Ingio IT Services and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, expenses, or fees arising from your use of our services or your violation of these Terms.

termination.title: Term and Termination
termination.description: These Terms remain in effect until terminated by either you or Ingio IT Services. We may terminate your access to our services at any time for any reason without prior notice.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease, and all provisions of these Terms that should by their nature survive termination shall survive.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Germany, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of the courts located within Munich, Bavaria for the resolution of any disputes.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for changes. Your continued use of our services following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

Layout.title: Ingio IT Services
Layout.description: Expert IT services, digitalization consulting, and AI workflow integration

personalAbout.title: Meet Your IT Partner
personalAbout.subtitle: Dependable local support from someone who speaks your language
personalAbout.name: Ingi Óskarsson
personalAbout.bio: With over a decade of experience in IT infrastructure and business technology, I provide hands-on support to small businesses throughout the Allgäu region. As a solo consultant, I offer the personal attention and flexibility that larger IT firms can't match.
personalAbout.approach: My approach is simple: I focus on practical solutions that make technology work for you, not the other way around. No unnecessary complexity, no technical jargon – just reliable IT that helps your business run smoothly.
personalAbout.local: Based in Allgäu, I understand the unique challenges local businesses face and provide responsive support when you need it most.
personalAbout.cta: Let's talk about how I can simplify your IT
